Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @Arno hey, can you send me the b address in a DM ?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@riseandfall agama wallet may not be able to deal with the extra bip39 passphrase

you can use this page: <https://iancoleman.io/bip39/>
visit the page and then disconnect the internet before entering your seed words and passphrase, select the coin as KMD and scroll down to the bottom
you should see your ledger addresses and private keys
select the address with your coins and copy the private key

login to Agama directly using privatekey <https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed>

after doing all this and making the required transaction, you should create a new ledger seed and transfer your coins there to revert to the previous level of security

Author: gcharang#6833
gcharang#6833
Content:
@Arno the b address is not controlled by anyone other than yourself and the person you are trading with
it is like a basic smart contract
the coins there can be moved by your trading partner; but doing so will expose the secret you need to move his coins that are being traded
or by you after a certain lock period is over
this is all done automatically by the app; some times, a button called "unlock funds" will appear, that has to be clicked

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: Hey guys, I still have the old agama wallet.. it no longer functions

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: how do i switch to the verus version?

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: will firing up the verus version overwrite all my wallet.dat files from my old agama wallet?

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: Just want to make sure I dont mess anything up here

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Sdunbar it won't overwrite anything
do you use native or lite mode?

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: native

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
ok, first backup your wallet.dat and just install the latest verus Agama wallet
you might need to do this: <https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024513-how-to-resync-your-komodo-blockchain-from-scratch-windows-linux-osx->
if you are on a fork

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: alright will do that

Author: Sdunbar#5064
Content: whats next after that?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
that is it
it should work as expected
